faq.question: Is IntelliDoc Safe for use?
faq.answer: IntelliDoc is safe to use, but the medical advise given by this bot shall not be considered a replacement for any medical advice given by qualified doctors.

faq.question: Why do we use it?
faq.answer: It is for provisional diagnosis, or to help people know what may be the issue with their bodies, this is not a replacement for any medical advice by a qualified doctor.

faq.question: Does IntelliDoc provide any other services?
faq.answer: Not currently, but we may offer api usage soon.

faq.question: Does it remember the conversations?
faq.answer: IntelliDoc has the functionality to remember one chat per use, that gets cleared after refershing the page, get premium subscription to acces all conversations.
